document.full_text: troy matteson shot a 6-under 66 on saturday in the puerto rico open to open a three-shot lead as he goes after the third pga tour victory.
document.title: matteson takes puerto rico open lead
lines_and_colors: troy matteson shot a 6-under 66 on saturday in the puerto rico open to open a three-shot lead as he goes after the third pga tour victory.
